attributes.action: People Who came after EU referendum from EU should not be allowed to stay,
attributes.background:
UK is already overcrowded special from EU migrant, we struggle to get NHS treatment or over kids have to study in overcrowded classes,
British Kids should have to have their right first

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
